title: PLEASE ALLOW SKINS IN TFT!!!!!
body: Can we please get an additional menu in the TFT game mode to customize the champions with skins we own! Please riot make buying skins for TFT players matter to.!

replies.body: That doesn’t work tho. If I use battle academia graves he is no longer a pirate. If I use mecha asol he’s a robot now. Thematically it doesn’t make sense plus somebody champs already use a skin such as gladiator Draven.

new skins for TFT only boom. now pay up.

Still doesn't work. They currently use the in-game skins to create classes/origins for champions. They won't make NEW Skins just for a gamemode where they are already wearing skins for a different purpose. 

Vayne: Uses her Arclight Skin to appear Noble, hence why she is part of the Nobles.

Draven: Uses Gladiator; not sure why he's got that as he's a Blademaster / Imperial. Guess it suits blademasters better?

Twisted Fate: uses Cutpurse
Miss Fortune: uses Captain
Graves: uses Cutthroat 

These are all Pirate themed, as they share the Pirate class.




Jayce: The newest addition on the PBE will be using BOTH his Base skin and his Fullmetal skin as he is a shapeshifter and swaps between the two. This is a new one as it's able to show they can use multiple skins in one.


So they wanted to use skins in this mode but in a more original and creative way then how they are presented in other modes. They've also mentioned wanting to include Odyssey, Dark Star and Cosmic skinlines too.

I think it would be a good idea but I don't think it will be implemented. Main reason is being able to notice what champ it is at a glance. If anything they might add a system to change the look for just you but that could be a cluster fuck and cause issues.
